## DidKeyMethod.deriveEncryptionKey() method

Transform a multibase-encoded multicodec value to public encryption key components that are suitable for encrypting messages to a receiver. A mathematical proof elaborating on the safety of performing this operation is available in: [On using the same key pair for Ed25519 and an X25519 based KEM](https://eprint.iacr.org/2021/509.pdf)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static deriveEncryptionKey(options: {
        multibaseValue: string;
    }): Promise<DidKeyDeriveEncryptionKeyResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { multibaseValue: string; } |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[DidKeyDeriveEncryptionKeyResult](./dids.didkeyderiveencryptionkeyresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;
